trans-unit.source: email is used in lists, detail Views (depends on the selected Layout) but also as ReplyTo Address in Emails to the partipant
images to this organizer (depents on Layout if visible)
name or organizer. is used in lists, detail Views (depends on the selected Layout) but also as SenderName in Emails to the partipant
phone of the organizer. Please use International ISO Format: +49 (89) 123 456 78
salesForceUserId : only this SalesForce user will have access to the events and registrations in Salesforce
